whatWeDo.title: Custom web solutions for growing businesses
whatWeDo.text: At Software Strategy we design and develop professional, fast and secure websites focused on SEO and conversion. From corporate landing pages to full ecommerce, we align design, development and strategy to deliver real results.
bullets: Responsive and accessible design: optimal UX on mobile, tablet and desktop
Technical SEO foundation: structure, metadata, performance and indexation
Conversion‑oriented content: clear benefits, social proof and effective CTAs
Speed and performance: optimized Core Web Vitals
Professional UX/UI: simple, clear and trustworthy navigation
Scalability: architecture ready to grow with your business
Analytics and events: measurement to drive data‑based decisions
ads: Tagging and conversions: events and tracking setup
Standardized UTMs for attribution and reporting
A/B testing of messages and CTAs to improve results

pricingSection.subtitle: Web Packages
pricingSection.title: Website options for every kind of business
pricingSection.description: Professional, SEO‑optimized sites ready to scale and connect with Google Ads and social campaigns.

plans.name: Package 1 · Basic Site
plans.description: Professional one‑page to present services, brand and contact. Ideal to get presence on Google quickly.
features: Single‑page site: services, contact and about

plans.name: Package 2 · Site + Google Ads
plans.description: Conversion‑optimized website with initial search campaigns setup to capture qualified leads.
features: Tag setup: Google Tag, GA4 and Conversions

plans.name: Package 3 · Site + Ads + Social
plans.description: End‑to‑end solution: complete website, Google Ads campaigns and ongoing social media management.
features: Responsive, technical SEO and speed optimized

pricingSection.note: *Domain and SSL subject to availability. Plans may vary based on scope, language, integrations and campaign volume.

items.q: How long does a custom website take?
items.a: It depends on scope. A basic site takes 2–4 weeks; ecommerce or integrations may require 6–10 weeks.

items.q: Is SEO included in every plan?
items.a: Yes. We include initial technical SEO (metadata, performance, indexing). Advanced SEO can be added on demand.
Yes. We offer support and maintenance plans for updates, security and continuous improvements.

items.q: Can you manage Google and Meta campaigns?
items.a: Yes. We have combined packages (site + campaigns) including setup, tracking and monthly optimization.

items.q: Do you prepare landing pages and conversions for Google Ads?
items.a: Yes. We design performance‑focused landing pages and configure conversions and UTMs to measure results from day one.
